name: Phantasma
description:
Phantasma is a medieval, dark-fantasy role-playing game. You play as a boy on a quest to save your mum from mercenaries. The specter of your father grants you weapons to defeat hostile creatures.

PC-compatible xbox 360 or ps3/ps4 controller required!

Phantasma is a work in progress. Please feel free to add feedback in the comments below!
